message:
Thanks Stephen!

I would like to suggest changing the usage of MarshalByRefObject
and instead, inheriting from ILogicalThreadAffinative 
as MS wrote in their docs:
"Only objects that expose the ILogicalThreadAffinative interface and are stored in the CallContext are propagated outside the AppDomain in a LogicalCallContext"

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.runtime.remoting.messaging.callcontext?view=netframework-4.8

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.runtime.remoting.messaging.ilogicalthreadaffinative?view=netframework-4.8
